tag_list: innovation-consulting, marketing, strategic-planning-and-positioning, business-and-market-development, brand-and-identity-development, individual-and-corporate-positioning, influencer-marketing, brand-experiences, public-relations, media-outreach, content
overview:
Debra Anderson is the CEO and Founder of Culture Shock, a New York City-based media consultancy for the creative industries. She is recognized for innovative strategic approaches to Content Curation, Brand Positioning and Marketing delivering multifaceted integrated media campaigns in global, digital and local markets.

Her clients range from Vimeo, the online video sharing platform (50+ Million Unique Visitors per month) to production companies, publishers and tech firms.
